issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
This crash happens to ~ 10 % of  our users and can especially be seen on old device where users want to open a window which is already being pushed.

The core-side solution is to check the navigation VC stack before and ignore the call in that case. The client side workaround could be to set a flag to block new window pushes before the window is opened.
fields.summary: iOS: Crash when trying to push a window twice (e.g. on slow devices)

comments.body:
Verified the Fix on SDK 8.1.0.v20190509024838.Works fine.
